description: French baguette with apricote jam and warm brie
Manchego, Iberico, Cabrales, olives, grapes, pecans, and smoked almonds
Battered/fried trout, corn tortillas, cilantro, pickled red onion and spinach
Pineapple, mango, and strawberries with layered yogurt and granola
Homemade perogies stuffed with a portabella mushrpoooms and carmalized onion, served with sour cream
Seared swordfish with rosemary, garlic, and a side of garlic smashed potatoes
Red lentils, onions and fresh parsley
Salmon filet cooked to order on top of a bed spring mix greens, onions, pecans and gorgonzola cheese
